first: 2022-12-05 12:30:00
second: 2022-12-06 01:00:00
'2022-12-05 12:30:00' is *earlier* than '2022-12-06 01:00:00'
first: 2022-12-25 00:00:00
second: 2022-01-01 05:22:01
'2022-12-25 00:00:00' is *later* than '2022-01-01 05:22:01'
first: 2022-12-25 00:00:00
second: 2022-12-25 00:00:00
'2022-12-25 00:00:00' is *equal to* '2022-12-25 00:00:00'
